overview: Will, shot on location in 1980s Harlem, focuses on Will (played by Obaka Adedunyo), a girlsâ€™ basketball coach fighting through a heroin addiction, while mentoring a 12-year-old street kid, adopted by Will and his wife (played by Loretta Devine).
tagline: A former athlete recovers from drug addition with the help of a homeless boy.
title: Will
